warped_knight.name: Warped Knight
warped_knight.description: As you stare into it's face inside the helmet, you make out skeletal features with left over flesh still clinging on.

plagued paladin.name: Plagued Paladin
plagued paladin.description: What used to be a pillar of virtue and holy has now become an armored beacon of evil.

plagued guardsman.name: Plagued Guardsman
plagued guardsman.description: The dangling flesh from various limbs is discolored green, best to strike from a distance if possible.
